title: Looking for Duo - pref ranks Mid gold to Mid plat
body: Hi guys looking for a duo for ranked solo/duo que. My current rank is Gold 1 ( I'm in promos for plat ) I was plat 4 but didn't play for a couple of months so I decayed back to gold. Goal is to reach diamond in the preseason. I Play ADC / JG and Mid. also Prefer someone who uses discord or some kind of voice comms, Add me in game if you want to duo - ii deceived ii
